title: A very fresh player!
body:
Hey All !

As I've mentioned in the title. I am a** fresh player** who has just started to play this game.
 From where should I start ? lol
Thank ya all

replies.body: Run!! Run from this place while you can and never look back!!
Aw. I wanted to add you and teach you a few things, but you're from EU!

A good place to start would be our [New Player Guide](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/new-player-guide#/?_k=r4nv2g)! We've recently added some great content to this guide and it goes over the basics of League. 

Let me know if you have any other questions. Welcome to the Rift! ^.^
